kpi.name: M1023C12

kpi_info.title: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR AMR IN DL
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU AMR data in SRNC in the downlink direction measured during the measurement interval. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals. If the UE is in softer handover, then the counter is updated for only one cell once per each BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR AMR IN DL
